scripts.build:all: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox && npm run build:edge

scripts.validate: npm run validate:encoding && npm run validate:manifests && npm run validate:security && node scripts/validate.js
scripts.validate:permissions: node -e "const m1=require('./manifest.json'); const m2=require('./manifest-edge.json'); console.log('ðŸ”’ Permissions audit:'); console.log('Firefox:', JSON.stringify(m1.permissions||[])); console.log('Chrome/Edge:', JSON.stringify(m2.permissions||[])); console.log('âœ… Permissions validated')"
scripts.validate:csp: node -e "const m1=require('./manifest.json'); const m2=require('./manifest-edge.json'); const csp1=m1.content_security_policy?.extension_pages; const csp2=m2.content_security_policy?.extension_pages; if(!csp1||!csp2) throw new Error('CSP missing'); if(csp1.includes('unsafe')||csp2.includes('unsafe')) throw new Error('Unsafe CSP detected'); console.log('âœ… CSP validated')"

scripts.release:minor: npm run release -- $(npm version minor --no-git-tag-version | sed 's/v//')
scripts.release:major: npm run release -- $(npm version major --no-git-tag-version | sed 's/v//')

scripts.performance:analyze: npm run build:analyze && echo 'ðŸ“Š Performance analysis completed'
